data.name: VUP-Simulator
data.detailed_description:
*This game does not support English temporarily

The VUP-Simulator is a game that allows you to experience the career of a virtual anchor. Here you can make your videos and get fans' attention, or live games in the live room to get audience applause (and rewards, etc.)
Upgrade your equipment (computer/microphone/camera, etc.) to improve the audience experience

Near Real VUP-Simulator Business Experience

In order to understand the resources and operations required to become a virtual anchor, as well as the various situations experienced by the virtual anchor, including soliciting contributions, looking for a modeler, recording videos, dealing with fan relationships, etc The game producer puts on a leather jacket and becomes a VUP-Simulator (there are some modifications because of the playfulness)

All Round Simulation Operation

To become a VUP-Simulator , you should not only pay attention to the number of fans and broadcasts, but also pay attention to physical strength and health, build your own live broadcasting platform, replace better equipment and train your skills.
In the future, you can also set up your own guild to recruit VUP-Simulator. There is a limit to one's number of fans, and more people are needed to operate together for more fans.

Other Ways to Make Money

The profit of VUP-Simulator may not be enough for daily expenses and equipment maintenance. There are other ways to make money. You can draw or program in part-time to make money, or you can open a computer to mine with a graphics card, not limited to VUP-Simulator

Support Mod and Creative Workshop

Not enough vertical paintings? Want to add a custom plot or event? This game supports the production of mod and creative workshop
Items that can be modified include but are not limited to various items (computer accessories, food, medicine, etc.), vertical drawing, illustration, expression package, painter, modeler, personalized fans, various events, learning items, themes, icons, etc. almost most of the contents in the game can be customized
In the future, DLL plug-ins will be supported, and games can even be written in the VUP-Simulator simulator

About Game Development and Discounts

I am basically the only one who has finished the UI script painting of the program (except for the script drawing), so the development progress is not very fast, but it can be guaranteed that there will be a major update every month (new available function, etc.)
We plan to gradually increase the price with the introduction of new content and functions, and give some concessions to players participating in the preemptive experience (but not necessarily)
The game discount starts at the beginning and the minimum 20% discount, and the minimum 60% discount after the official version is 3 years. If you want to wait for the discount, you can add a wish list first.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 2 Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Ability to display
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
